title: Disconnecting only in game
body: So since about a month ago I've been constantly disconnecting in game. I can chat fine and up until actual games everything works smoothly but as soon as I'm in game I'm 'attempting to reconnect' for like 90% of the game.. Any thoughts/experiences/solutions?

replies.body: It seems like your network is failing to connect to the game server, and ultimately kicking you off.  Your best bet would be to go over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to get this resolved.  Let me know if you have any questions!
